name: Scared of Light
description:
Play as the spider you often lose in your room, sticking to the shadows to avoid detection from the owners of the house so you don't get squished. Some shadows are too far apart and require you using your web to move objects around. Make it to the other corner of the room to claim your treasure.

Controls

Shoot Web - Hold Alt to pull objects towards you.

Sprint - Hold Shift.

Look Around -  Mouse.

Move Forward - W.

Move Left - A.

Move Right - D.

Move Backwards - S.

Jump - SPACEBAR.
